Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: I like this place. It's always full of students and people working so I like the enviroment. They also have a lot of board games to use. Really recommended the quiche or the Noodle soup. The only problem why I don't give 5 stars is that ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Such a comfortable place to have a drink and work. They also serve different fresh dishes everyday. After the drink, we tried a vegetarian meal; the pumpkin lasagna with feta and mushroom, served with salad on the side and it was delicious!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: You gotta order a sandwich here! Great taste, not overpriced. At the windows you can work on your laptop, or relax and talk to strangers at the large table.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: A great place to eat and /or drink, quite industrial in style and attracts a friendly and mixed clientele.  The food we had on this visit was really exceptional - tasty and excellent value for money. One of our party had some specific ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great food, amazing view and light. Perfect for studying, working, lunch, dinner, everything!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text:
Great place to work!! Good wifi, nice open space, they also have a small outside area, I didn't check for plucks though. ü§î
On Sunday there's the Sunday Roast, for 10‚Ç¨ quite the big plate and you can have ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Simple but good food in a school-canteen-like atmosphere. Situated on a corner it has seating across the whole window, allowing for great views of the street while you eat or drink. Double espresso and cheese cake for dessert were fine too. Selection of bottled beers and wine available.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: This place is good to come and work, but the food leaves something to be desired.  My salad was limp with dry chicken and drenched in oil. WiFi cut on and off the whole time.  You have to bus your own tables.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Really nice place where you can choose dishes for your lunch or dinner. You can be full just pay around 20 euro. It could be soup, some vegetable add-on with meet or fish and a bottle of beer. I was enjoy to have a dinner there and after you can go to the city center and continue your exploring.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Nice restaurant with an unconventional way of serving. It's good quality food and there's a choice of 3 different meals each day. Its a bit like a school caffettiera but with better food. Great place for a cheap meal.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: This is a cheap place that offers sandwiches and Thai food. Italian too. they offer a lot, so for a big group of people this might work. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: I go here for my lunchtime sandwich which is freshly made and really good. Usually quite busy. They serve full meals here also. Interior decor is basic but nice.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: I like it, nice place to work. Good food, not very expensive. Music is decent but apparently with the wifi you have an option to choose music. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Good, nutritious fare. Location is convenient, and the interior is basic but nice. I sometimes come here to work on my laptop. Priced very reasonably thanks to self-service.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Spacious, cheap coffee, good temperature, large table space, good music volume. Internet is slow however, and limited to either 3 or 8 hours, depending on whether the barista likes you.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: I came by on a Saturday evening for dinner. The restaurant has a cozy feel to it and wasn't too crowded. The staff was very friendly and I ordered the baked salmon and potatoes. Would definitely come again!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: The place has a school-cafeteria vibe to it. You order at the bar and take your food with a tray to your table. Different food options are offered every day next to the regular menu. All very fresh!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Calm and laid-back place. Food was comforting and tasty, nothing outrageous but home-cooked food. The desert is very thick therefore aren't everyone's taste and No cash at all.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great place where to have lunch and to work in an easy environment. Seating comfort could be  improved with better chairs but that‚Äôs being picky. I like the big windows arrangement!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Nice place to work, good wifi, and coffee isn't that bad. Food isn't that great though. I had the lasagne and it was a bit too salty. No table service.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: The space felt relaxing, it is beautifully organized with large wooden tables and big windows all around. The food was better than average and fairly cheap, but not remarkable.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great place in the pijp for a quick bite or a drink. Perfect spot for those who want a place to study or work. Food is very standard,   price quality. Normal products for a normal price.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Lovely and calmed place to have a coffee and work with your laptop. The food is good and the price is on the average for this city. Recommended for students and creatives.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great place to study. Prices are reasonably cheap because of the self-service. The sandwiches are amazing, good quality of ingredients!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Nice location, good view of busy street, but wifi is only 1 hour long. I like to do my uni work there. Short internet duration works good if you have work to do.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: The definition of an awful service... The service is better at Febo... was in a hurry, told the guy that I wouldn't take a toasted sandwich (7min) but another one cause I had only 15min to have lunch, he served 5 other people before he ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Casual and relaxing atmosphere. Great vibe to the place, good music, and loved their food. Went for breakfast and came back for lunch.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Superb cheesecake, good value breakfast menus and an extra plus for a creative way if asking for tip where you can try to balance your coins on a lemon in water to enter a prize draw.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great concept. Good, nutritious, fast food, choice of fish, meat or veg for dinner.  Soup, salad and dessert if you want. No cash.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: The best neighbourhood kitchen I‚Äôve ever lived close to. I love being here and it always feels like a welcoming living room in the Pijp.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Super hip, very good food for a very good price. Great place to do some work, even during or after dinner time.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Disappointing quality of the food. Overcooked buffet food without strong tastes, small portions. The WiFi was ok.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Nice place, great cooking for good prices and free wi-fi. Suggested for students and for working people

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: This used to be an extention of my living room. A no nonsense place, where you can work, chill, read a newspaper or have a quick dinner. You‚Äôre severely missed!

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great place to grab a bite and get some work done. They have WiFi and indoor and outdoor seating.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great food at a reasonbale price. Staff very helpful as were other diners.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Easy, healthy and fast restaurant. Worth for having a quick ‚Äúin between‚Äù lunch

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Good food, have been coming for years now.  Unfortunately prices went up and portions went down

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Got breakfast there 3 times. Juice, bread, yogurt and coffee. Perfect way to start the morning.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Nice cheap place to eat or work. It has an east-Berlin feel to it.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: I like the concept, but not the food. If that would improve it would be a great place. But I'm not going to try...

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Very good sandwich! Offers both Deutch and English menus.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Great space for co-working, or meeting a group for coffee/lunch.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Cheap, quality food. Love the environment and staff there.

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Good food, fair price, friendly service

Name: Stadskantine
Review Text: Good food and nice prices.  Service is cute

Review Text: Cool place to make an external office. Wifi free, tables and plugs.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) A quiet place, where people regularly work with the laptop. Cozy music is playing and you eat at a good price. We have a nice sandwich, but they offer more. We look forward to a return visit to have dinner there. ‚Ä¶
